Translations.Text: 'alam nwse -ayha alnby- lak sadrak lshraye aldyn, waldaewat 'iilaa allh, walatsaf bmkarm alakhlaq, whttna eank bdhlk himlk aldhy athql zhrk, wjelnak -bma 'aneamna ealayk min almkarm- fi mnzlt rafieat ealy?

fla ythnk 'adhana aedayk ean nashr alrsalt; fa'iina mae aldyq frjana, 'iina mae aldyq frjana

f'idha faraght min 'umur aldunya washghalha fajidd fi alebadt, wa'iilaa rabik wahdah farghab fima endh
